title: How to Disable "Message Seen" Read Receipts on WhatsApp

steps.title: Open WhatsApp.
steps.content: Open WhatsApp. It’s the green app with the white phone and chat bubble icon. If you turn off blue ticks (Read Receipts), you won't be able to see them from others either. [1] X Research source You can't disable the blue ticks (Read Receipts) for group chats in WhatsApp .

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . You’ll find it in the bottom-right corner of the screen. If WhatsApp opens to a conversation, first tap the back button in the top-left corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Privacy.
steps.content: Tap Privacy . You can find this underneath Account .

steps.title: Toggle off "Read Receipts".
steps.content: Toggle off "Read Receipts". You'll need to scroll down to see this option. The switch will turn grey. Read Receipts will turn off. If the switch is white, read receipts are already disabled.

steps.title: Open WhatsApp.
steps.content: Open WhatsApp. It's the green app with a white phone and chat bubble icon.

steps.title: Tap ⋮.
steps.content: Tap ⋮ . You can find this button in the top-right corner of your screen. If WhatsApp opens to a conversation, first tap the back button in the top-left corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . It's at the bottom of the drop-down menu here. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Toggle off "Read receipts".
steps.content: Toggle off "Read receipts". You may need to scroll down to find this option. Unchecking the Read receipts box will disable read receipts in non-group conversations and prevent the blue "Message Seen" ticks from appearing in your chats. You should be good to go now!
